metadata.title: CVE-2023-22656 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds read in Intel(R) Media SDK and some Intel(R) oneVPL softwarebefore version 23.3.5 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableescalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
onevpl package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
